name: Detective Game (NestRai)
description:
i couldn't export for linux or mac because i have no clue how to use gamemaker properly

soundtrack:

https://nestrai.bandcamp.com/album/detective-game-the-crappy-ass-ost-i-made-in-1...

there is a criminal known for doing a lot of crime that was put in jail recently.

you are a detective.

you have to move around a town to collect information from the townspeople to get info of Criminal.

when someone says something interesting to you, you write it down.

when you talk to everyone and everything call the police and tell them everything.
